addingAfterCancelFailed.message: Browser rejected the download. You can retry downloading with the browser by clicking the download link again

installationConsentDialog.description: Consent dialog displayed when the user installs the FDM extension
installationConsentDialog.message:
The FDM extension asks for your permission to send download data between your browser and the FDM application on your computer.

If you refuse, download interceptions will not work, and the extension will be removed from your browser.

Do you agree to anonymous data collection?
